name: Gullbird: Flappy Viking
description:
Gullbird: Flappy Viking

Choose your bird and take on this adventure collecting as much gold as you can and destroying everything that gets in your way with your favorite weapon!

----------------------------------------------- CONTROLS

A or J- JUMP

S or K- AXE

------------------------------------------------------

My first published game, hope you like it

Check out the concept art project in my Artstation
